Room.Name: Oceanview/Eidenhoft/Nagaritha Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the rather busy intersection of Oceanview Drive, Nagaritha Drive and Eidenhoft Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: Eidenhoft Boulevard runs awkwardly from northeast to southwest. The road eventually turns northward and ends up at Lithium Inlet. Oceanview Drive is a scenic alternative to the always busy and crowded Main Street. It runs parallel to Main Street for almost its entire distance. Nagaritha Drive runs east to west and borders both the large estates and the vast farmlands in the east.
